mapper.insert: insert into room_img (uuid, uploadpath, filename, roomno) values (#{uuid},#{uploadPath},#{fileName},#{roomno})
mapper.select: select imgno from room_img where roomno = #{roomno}
select * from room_img where uploadpath = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
select imgno from room_img order by imgno desc limit 1;

select k_room.roomno,k_room.imgno,k_room.roomprice,k_room.roomtype,k_room.roomcontent,k_room.roomcnt,k_room.roometc, room_img.uuid,room_img.uploadPath,room_img.fileName from k_room, room_img where k_room.roomno = room_img.roomno
